update product_sku set sku_name = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_stock = #{productStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_price = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_sale_price = #{productSalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
